title: Yuru Yuri,
synopsis: Akari Akaza, Chinatsu Yoshikawa, Kyouko Toshinou, and Yui Funami return to commemorate an exciting occasion! Despite their initial bizarre celebration ideas, they decide to hold a party at their Amusement Club room. With the help of friends from the Student Council, they start preparing for the big day—with a surprise planned for a special someone.
characters: ['Toshinou, Kyouko', 'Akaza, Akari', 'Funami, Yui', 'Yoshikawa, Chinatsu', 'Sugiura, Ayano', 'Oomuro, Sakurako', 'Ikeda, Chitose', 'Furutani, Himawari', 'Akaza, Akane', 'Furutani, Kaede']
